label: AB4_mP10_14_a_2e-001
title: CdP$_{4}$ Structure
comments:
(Krebs, 1956) give distances in kX. We follow (Wood, 1947) and convert this to {\AA}ngstroms by multiplying their distances by 1.00202. 
 This is the low temperature form OsP$_{4}$ and RuP$_{4}$ (Fl\"{o}rke, 1982).  For the high temperature form see the \href{current_web_home_dir/AB4_mC20_15_e_2f-001}{CrP$_{4}$ structure}.
